mapper.select: SELECT blog_article_info.id, author, article_title, image_url, tag_name, blog_article_info.create_by, article_views, like_num FROM ( ( ( blog_article_info LEFT JOIN blog_article_image ON blog_article_info.id = blog_article_image.article_id ) LEFT JOIN blog_info_sort ON blog_article_info.id = blog_info_sort.article_id ) LEFT JOIN blog_tag ON blog_info_sort.sort_id = blog_tag.id ) WHERE blog_article_info.is_delete = 0 AND blog_sort.is_effective = 1 ORDER BY blog_article_info.create_by DESC
